about:
I'm a full stack web developer based in Delaware. I thrive on unraveling complex problems and transforming them into streamlined, elegant solutions. I graduated from Northeastern University, with a Master of Science in Software Engineering, in 2024.


Currently mastering> Laravel, AWS, React

Currently building> gamedood, a 2-D gaming website

timeline.description: Helping modernize the companyâ€™s core ATS, by transforming the legacy platform into a secure, cloud-native, and scalable recruiting solution.

timeline.title: Full Stack Web Developer Co-op, Neva Group Inc.
timeline.description: Worked on truulee.com (Currently in pre-launch), with Laravel.

timeline.title: Master's in Software Engineering
timeline.description: Studied at Northeastern University, Boston. Specialized in DSA/OOPs, Web Development, Cloud Computing, and Game dev.

timeline.title: Technology Analyst, Metlife Inc. (Infosys Ltd.)
timeline.description: Developed, tested, and supported over 60 Mainframe and Java Core systems/applications.

timeline.title: Bachelor's in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
timeline.description: Studied at SRM University and learned the fundamentals of programming and system design.

funstuff.title: fun facts.
items: I love powerlifting, bodybuilding, and Muay Thai.
I'm from India, and I grew up in Singapore.
In my spare time, I love playing Rocket League, Dota 2, and Counter Strike.
I'm currently attempting to build my first microSaaS.
